skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vince tracy podcasts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Each week they take a very jaundiced view of the news in the UK

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Vince Tracy Podcasts to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Vince Tracy Podcasts to start from first episode”
priv:
